section.para: A set containing the (*) tag becomes a magic "any" set and will always match. This saves having to declare a dummy set containing all imaginable tags. Useful for testing whether a cohort exists at a position, without needing details about it.

section.title: _S_DELIMITERS_
section.para: The magic set _S_DELIMITERS_ is created from the DELIMITERS definition. This saves having to declare and maintain a seperate set for matching delimiters in tests.

section.title: _S_SOFT_DELIMITERS_
section.para: The magic set _S_SOFT_DELIMITERS_ is created from the SOFT-DELIMITERS definition.
